author: Special Correspondent
text:
Members of Salem Citizens Forum staging a demonstration in Salem on Tuesday in protest against the distraint proceedings against farmers.—Photo: E. Lakshmi Narayanan

Members of the Salem Citizens Forum staged a demonstration holding candles in their hands on Tuesday to protest against distraint proceedings against the farmers by private financial institutions.

Led by Piyush Sethia, convener, Salem Citizens Forum, they raised slogans condemning the illegal methods adopted by the financial institutions for collecting the loan dues.

At the end, holding the candles, they stood in silence for a minute to pay respect to the memory of Azhagar, a famer of Ariyalur, who committed suicide due to harassment by a private institute for collecting the loan dues.
title: Demonstration staged
